---
name: Razorback
type: AV
speed: 30cm
armour: 5+
cc: 6+
ff: 5+<br>(4+)
special_rules:
  - transport
notes:
  |
    May transport one infantry unit (except a Terminator unit) without _Jump Packs_ or _Mounted_. Armed with either a Twin Heavy Bolter or a Twin Lascannon. Razorbacks armed with a Twin Heavy Bolter have their firefight value increased to 4+.
weapons:
  -
    id: twin-heavy-bolter
    multiplier: 0–1
  -
    id: twin-lascannon
    multiplier: 0–1
---
